content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mine at position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position 16.0, 71.0) 
- Wooden chest (position 16.5, 72.5) to collect iron ore

### Iron Smelter at position(17.0, 74.0)
Consists of 
- Stone furnace (position 17.0, 74.0)
- Burner inserter (position 17.5, 72.5) to transfer iron ore from chest to furnace
- Output chest (position 17.5, 76.5) to receive iron plates

### ERROR TIPS

* Errors when placing entities too far away
  - Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum distance allowed is 10 units.
* Errors when inserting items into entities
  - Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity.
* Errors when placing entities with insufficient spacing or incorrect direction
  - Ensure there is sufficient spacing and correct direction when placing entities next to other entities.
* Errors when crafting items with missing sub-ingredients
  - Ensure you have the required sub-ingredients in your inventory and that they can be crafted or smelted before attempting to craft the final item.
* Errors when attempting to place entities without having them in inventory
  - Ensure you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
